name: Beach Bounce Remastered
overview: Tomoyo finds himself at his grandmother Umi's beach resort, looking forward to a great summer where he can finally put the past to rest and possibly take his life forward in a better way than the coasting he was doing up until now. Of course, there is always a catch... And now it looks like his summer vacation is dashed on the rocks before it begins. The only upside is the many beautiful female staff members working at the resort.
